ing: 3 ounces baby carrots, cut into chunks
des: "This is my own interpretation of a smoothie recipe that my acupuncturist gave to me. It keeps me satisfied all morning while I am at work."
ins: Pour soy milk and flax seeds into a blender. Allow flax seeds to soften, 1 to 3 minutes. Turn blender on and add yogurt, strawberries, banana, carrots, and coconut, blending well after each addition. Add blueberries and blend until smooth.
